meanings.definition: The act of forming an arch.
meanings.sent1: The archings of the bridge were carefully crafted by the builders.
meanings.sent2: The archings of the doorway added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The archings of the cake layers made it look like a delicious tower.
meanings.sent4: The archings of the tree branches reached towards the sky like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The archings of the rainbow painted a colorful arc across the sky.

meanings.definition: The curved shape of an arch.
meanings.sent1: The archings of the window frame gave it a unique design.
meanings.sent2: The archings of the bridge created a strong support structure.
meanings.sent3: The archings of the road sign made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The archings of the hills in the distance looked like giant waves frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The archings of the clouds formed a beautiful canopy above us.

meanings.sent1: The archings of the metal rod showed the strength of the material.
meanings.sent2: The archings of the fabric indicated a skilled tailor's work.
meanings.sent3: The archings of the balloon animal brought smiles to the children's faces.
meanings.sent4: The archings of the riverbanks revealed the power of the flowing water.
meanings.sent5: The archings of the athlete's body displayed years of dedicated training.
